result.execSummary:
The defendant Marco A. Ortiz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Marco A. Ortiz is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Marco A. Ortiz was found guilty of Possession of Cocaine/Coca(2nd+), a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Marco A. Ortiz in court with attorney Mark W. Frank.  Linda A. Hoffman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Guilty Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Def. guilty.  Court imposes sentence.

Count 2:
$518.00 costs, 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.
9 mos. in Sauk County Jail, with huber, consecutive.  Commence on or before Feb. 23, 2015 @ 7 pm
3 day credit
Provide DNA sample if not already provided 

Count 1:  Dismissed 
Paperwork handed in court.
Plea/sentencing hearing on February 11, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on January 29, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Marco A. Ortiz in court with attorney Mark W. Frank.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Rec'd copy of INFO/waived reading.   Stands Mute, Court enters Not Guilty Plea, set for trial br. 2.  Bond continues.

Defendant Marco A. Ortiz in court with attorney Mark W. Frank at 2:20 p.m.  John A. Newton appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Frank advises of waiver today.  Request ARGN.  Offer has been extended.  Court finds probable cause, bind over for Br 2.   Bond continues.  Attorney Frank request argn date and felony plea/sentencing.  New address provided.  Arraignment scheduled for December 18, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Marco A. Ortiz
Current: 106 Whitlock Street, Apt. 3, Wisconsin Dells, WI 53965 United States  (Effective: 11-07-2014)
Prior: 222 7th Ave, Baraboo, WI 53913
DE's Demand for Disclosure and Motion for Discovery

Pre-trial conference on October 24, 2014 at 10:00 am.
Return date on November 7, 2014 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Marco A. Ortiz by video from LEC attorney Catherine Ankenbrandt Louise Ankenbrandt.  Defendant Marco A. Ortiz in custody.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  State requests cash bond.  Atty Ankenbrandt responds.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $500.00 signature bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Not to possess/consume any controlled substances w/o valid prescription.  DE does qualify for PD appt.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 24, 2014 at 10:00 am.  Return date scheduled for November 7, 2014 at 01:00 pm.
